title: Rinkeby sync error
body:
I was testing Rinkeby sync a few days ago on `extract_validating` branch, and now decided to restart the node (from today's master branch), and getting this:


````
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.489] Build info                               git_branch= git_commit=b7996c66d9e949f35ad12a70ded9f014e0b77aff
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.491] Starting Turbo-Geth on Rinkeby testnet...
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.491] Dropping default light client cache      provided=0 updated=128
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.491] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.492] Set global gas cap                       cap=25000000
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.492] Opening Database (LMDB)                  mapSize="2.0 TB" maxFreelistReuse=1000
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.499] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 4 Homestead: 1 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 2 EIP155: 3 EIP158: 3 Byzantium: 1035301 Constantinople: 3660663 Petersburg: 4321234 Istanbul: 5435345, Muir Glacier: <nil>, YOLO v2: <nil>, Engine: clique}"
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.500] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[65 64]" network=4
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.511] Most recent local header                 number=8136594 hash="4f67c6…71acbc" td=14119211 age=4d16h10m
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.511] Most recent local block                  number=3104498 hash="ff5bd7…63a86c" td=5756184  age=2y5mo1w
INFO [03-02|10:48:25.511] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=turbo-geth/v2021.03.1-alpha-b7996c66/linux-amd64/go1.15.2
INFO [03-02|10:48:26.092] New local node record                    seq=135 id=4f1d75596972a080 ip=127.0.0.1 udp=30303 tcp=30303
INFO [03-02|10:48:28.674] Mapped network port                      proto=udp extport=30303 intport=30303 interface="UPNP IGDv1-PPP1"
INFO [03-02|10:48:36.093] Block synchronisation started
INFO [03-02|10:48:36.104] Looking for peers                        peercount=2 tried=64 static=0
WARN [03-02|10:48:38.995] Invalid header encountered               number=8136595 hash="860726…4f7c43" parent="4f67c6…71acbc" err="invalid voting chain"
WARN [03-02|10:48:38.995] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=1aabba770181eef1 err="stagedsync.VerifyHeaders failed retrieved hash chain is invalid: invalid voting chain(actual error)"
INFO [03-02|10:48:46.220] Looking for peers                        peercount=1 tried=60 static=0
WARN [03-02|10:48:54.049] Invalid header encountered               number=8136595 hash="860726…4f7c43" parent="4f67c6…71acbc" err="invalid voting chain"
WARN [03-02|10:48:54.049] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=a0012109d0b1c84f err="stagedsync.VerifyHeaders failed retrieved hash chain is invalid: invalid voting chain(actual error)"
INFO [03-02|10:48:56.917] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=36 static=0
WARN [03-02|10:49:06.969] Invalid header encountered               number=8136595 hash="860726…4f7c43" parent="4f67c6…71acbc" err="invalid voting chain"
WARN [03-02|10:49:06.969] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=9d97069b6d438551 err="stagedsync.VerifyHeaders failed retrieved hash chain is invalid: invalid voting chain(actual error)"
INFO [03-02|10:49:06.969] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=74 static=0
INFO [03-02|10:49:17.113] Looking for peers                        peercount=1 tried=74 static=0
WARN [03-02|10:49:22.173] Invalid header encountered               number=8136595 hash="860726…4f7c43" parent="4f67c6…71acbc" err="invalid voting chain"
WARN [03-02|10:49:22.173] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=a0012109d0b1c84f err="stagedsync.VerifyHeaders failed retrieved hash chain is invalid: invalid voting chain(actual error)"
````
